content: Well then, I'll leave this <color=#8AAB4B>candy artisan's token of gratitude</color> with you!
info: 随机任务-提交兑换-提提_随机任务1

content:
Alright, let's see what these recyclables are worth!
Let me calculate...
One tael, two taels...
info: 随机任务-提交兑换-提提_随机任务1

content:
*Ding*—
Let me think for a moment.
info: 随机任务-提交兑换-提提_随机任务1

content:
Hmm... but before that,
let me find some inspiration
for sugar art here.
info: 随机任务-提交兑换-提提_随机任务1

content: Submit these recyclables.
info: 随机任务-提交兑换-提提_随机任务1

content: I want to thank you for the sugar art!
info: 随机任务-提交兑换-提提_随机任务1

content: Let me think about it.
info: 随机任务-提交兑换-提提_随机任务1

content:
Oh, and don't worry too much about it,
The recycling value can be accumulated,
I'll keep track of it for you.
info: 随机任务-提交兑换-提提_随机任务1

content:
Ah, since the candy figures are naturally perfect,
the gifts inside
might be naturally perfect too~
info: 随机任务-提交兑换-提提_随机任务1

content:
I've converted the recycling value you collected
into candy figurine rewards!
Would you like to accept them?
info: 随机任务-提交兑换-提提_随机任务1

content: Yes! I want it!
info: 随机任务-提交兑换-提提_随机任务1

content:
Oh? Need some time to prepare a proper thank-you gift?
Don't worry, the turbulent flow will continue for a while longer.
I'll be right here waiting for you.
info: 随机任务-提交兑换-提提_随机任务1

content:
*Ding!*
Have you collected enough flotsam to exchange?
Or would you like to trade in your recycled goods for a reward?
info: 随机任务-提交兑换-提提_随机任务1

content:
So, would you like to save up some more?
The drifting items will be scattered along the shore with the currents.
If you can't find them, keep an eye out for unusual glimmers!
info: 随机任务-提交兑换-提提_随机任务1

content:
Thanks to my dedicated practice,
my sugar figurines look incredibly lifelike,
and no, I don't actually trap people inside them like some people think!
info: 随机任务-提交兑换-提提_随机任务1

content:
As for what you'll get,
Little Sugar told me to—keep it a secret!
info: 随机任务-提交兑换-提提_随机任务1

content:
Perfect! That's enough to exchange for a batch of recyclables!
And don't forget to come see me for your reward!
info: 随机任务-提交兑换-提提_随机任务1

content: I'll save up some more.
info: 随机任务-提交兑换-提提_随机任务1

content:
Alright, looks like these turbulent waters will stick around for a while.
There should be plenty more flotsam to salvage,
I'll keep waiting for you here.
info: 随机任务-提交兑换-提提_随机任务1

content:
<size=30>Besides,
it's not even that size...</size>
info: 随机任务-提交兑换-提提_随机任务1

content:
For every <color=#8AAB4B>2</color> pieces of flotsam,
I'll recycle them and give you a reward in return.
Come find me again when you're ready.
info: 随机任务-提交兑换-提提_随机任务1
